snippet: Oilfield services company Baker Hughes Inc. says the number of rigs exploring for oil and natural gas in the U.S. remained unchanged this week at 1,777....

headline.print_headline: US Rig Count Stable, Remains This Week at 1,777
headline.main: US Rig Count Stable, Remains This Week at 1,777

lead_paragraph: Oilfield services company Baker Hughes Inc. says the number of rigs exploring for oil and natural gas in the U.S. remained unchanged this week at 1,777.
